Client.Name: Shanghai Limradar Electronic Technology Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Shanghai Limradar was established in 2020. Our company focuses on radar detection, multi-sensor fusion, artificial intelligence traffic control and other technology research in the field of transportation, and provides relevant millimeter wave radar products around intelligent transportation, intelligent security, advanced assisted driving, rail safety and other applications.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The data we store are radar test records used in various fields. Our company's product---Radar can be applied in several scenarios, including Smart Traffic, Smart Security, Advanced Driving Assistance, Track and traffic safety, etc. We have a large accumulation of data.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use lotus to prepare data.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
